sql:
SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
qty as value
FROM sample.orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
amount as value
FROM sample.orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp
FROM sample.events
WHERE event = 'Add to Cart'

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp
FROM sample.orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
amount as value
FROM sample.orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
amount as value
FROM sample.orders
